NetworkSim.simulation.tools.publication.plot_delayÂ¶

NetworkSim.simulation.tools.publication.plot_delay(simulator, delay='td', span='e', metrics=['mean'], analytical=True, semilog=True)[source]Â¶

Plot delay statistics of a ParallelSimulator.

Parameters

  • simulator (ParallelSimulator) â The simulator used.

  • delay (str, optional) â The type of delay to be plotted, by default td, chosen from the following:

    • qd, queueing delay or queueing

      The overall queueing delay.

    • td, transfer delay or transfer

      The transfer delay.

  • span (str, optional) â The time span of the delay statistics in the simulation, by default extended, chosen from the following:

    • overall or all

      The entire duration of the simulation.

    • final batch or fb

      The statistics from the final batch when simulation converges.

    • extended or e

      The extended period of the simulation.

  • metrics (list, optional) â A list of the metric(s) of delay statistics, by default mean, chosen from the following:

    • mean

      Mean delay statistics.

    • min

      Minimum delay statistics.

    • max

      Maximum delay statistics.

  • analytical (bool, optional) â If analytical results are plotted, by default True

  • semilog (bool, optional) â If to plot data on a semi-logarithmic scale

Returns

fig â The figure plotted.

Return type

Figure
